1370: Ghodscalc was born in Nieu straet in 1370.
Got married to Jacomin at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Jacomin, Ghodscalc, at age 29.
1388: Had a son with Jacomin, Abelkijn, at age 47.

1381: Lost daughter Ermerut when Ermerut was 6 years old.
